mapper.select: select * from sys_roles_depts rd left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id = rd.dept_id where rd.role_id=#{roleId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
select * from sys_dept where pid=#{pid, jdbcType=BIGINT}
select * from sys_dept where pid is null
select count(1) from sys_dept where pid=#{pid, jdbcType=BIGINT}
